casebody.data:
HOCKNEY & ASSO.
v.
CORNELIUS. No. 353P05-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 26, 2006. Grady L. Balentine, Jr., Assistant Attorney General, for C. Preston Cornelius. C. Preston Cornelius, Pro Se. The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 26th day of July 2005 by Plaintiff to Request Article III Court: "Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference this the 26th day of January 2006." Justice EDMUNDS recused.
